page.title: 07 EDUCATION - WEST ROW
page.content: COMPULSORY EDUCATION IN THIS AREA IS BASED ON THE THREE TIER COMPREHEN- SIVE SYSTEM.CHILDREN FROM THE WEST ROW AREA ATTEND THE VILLAGE SCHOOL BEFORE TRANSFERRING AT 9+ TO THE RIVERSIDE MIDDLE SCHOOL AND AT 13+ TO THE UPPER SCHOOL,BOTH IN MILDENHALL. WEST ROW C.P.SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN 1874,FOLLOWING THE EDUCATION ACT OF 1870.IT WAS ORIGINALLY DESIGNED FOR 220 CHILDREN AND UNTIL 1939 CATERED FOR PUPILS FROM 5 TO 14 YEARS.SINCE THEN IT HAS BEEN MUCH IMPROVED WITH THE ADDITION OF A HALL,A KITCHEN AND A CLASSROOM BUT IT STILL RETAINS ITS FINE VICTORIAN EXTERIOR. INCLUDING THE HEADMASTER THERE ARE 4 TEACHERS AND 99 CHILDREN ON ROLL,A QUARTER OF WHOM ARE BROUGHT IN FROM OUTLYING AREAS.
